description: This speedy chicken ramen is light and flavoursome, perfect for lunch or a light dinner.
name: Grilled Chicken & Mushroom Ramen Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5cm ginger, peeled and sliced into matchsticks
0.5 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped, stalks included
4 medium spring onions, sliced, tops reserved

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large griddle pan on the highest setting. Brush the chicken breasts on each side with half of the oil and cook for 4 minutes on each side, until cooked through. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Heat the rest of the oil in a deep pan on medium heat and cook the mushrooms for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic, ginger and coriander stalks and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour over the stock, bring to the boil and reduce the heat. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Bring the soup back to the boil, add the noodles and bok choi and cook for 4 minutes, stir in the spring onions and cook for 2 minutes. Season with soy sauce.
Serve in bowls with sliced chicken, chilli, spring onion tops and fresh coriander scattered on top.
